public method context::Reaction::Variable::equivalent (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in equivalent: 5
sub equivalent {
  my $self = shift; my $other = shift;
  return 0 unless $other->class eq 'Variable';
  return $self->{name} eq $other->{name};
}

sub TeX {

# Number of lines of code in TYPE: 4
sub TYPE {
  my $self = shift;
  return ($self->type eq 'Constant'? "'$self->{name}'" : 'an element');
}
